channel.title: Commands for 2 people? (667)
channel.description: Can anyone tell me how to make a command for two people? Like for exmaple, Right now for some commands it says c playername= "homework" or something like that. How do I make it for 2 people without running in to a compile error?

item.title: Commands for 2 people? (667)
item.dc:creator: @ic3cr34m ic3cr34m
item.description:
@ic3cr34m wrote:

[quote=“308507631, post:6, topic:457234”][quote author=ic3cr34m link=topic=560167.msg4090611#msg4090611 date=1346292466]

[quote author=308507631 link=topic=560167.msg4090610#msg4090610 date=1346292384]

That’s for 474. I’m talking about 667.
[/quote] Next time specify yourself.

Happy? I changed the title.
[/quote] I can careless honestly, it was just a tip…[/quote]
If you careless… Than don’t comment idiot.

item.title: Commands for 2 people? (667)
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

if (playerCommand.qtarswith…blablabla) {
if (c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“name1”) || c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“name2”) {
//Code
}
}

|| means “or”
if playername is name1 or playername is name2 - do the command
